rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0001
rows.name:
Man, what a view...
I like this boat.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh? I didn't know you were interested
in Divine Beast battleships, Satahiko.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0003
rows.name:
I don't much care about the Divine Beast part,
but the tech element I find fascinating.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0004
rows.name: Don't you get excited just looking at it?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0005
rows.name: I just want to tinker with it all.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0006
rows.name: Gimme a hand, will ya, Ootsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0007
rows.name: Yes! Let me at it!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0008
rows.name: What should I say to Ootsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0009
rows.name: You must be great at carrying stuff.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0010
rows.name: Are you good with your hands?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0011
rows.name: What do I say to Ootsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0012
rows.name: I bet you're good at heavy lifting.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0013
rows.name: Are you good with your hands, then?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0014
rows.name: What shall I say to Ootsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0015
rows.name: You seem well-suited to manual labor.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0016
rows.name: Are you in fact surprisingly dextrous?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0017
rows.name: What'll I say to Ootsuchi?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0018
rows.name: You do a lot of heavy lifting, am I right?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0019
rows.name: You good with your hands, then?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0101
rows.name: Are you makin' fun of me?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0102
rows.name: I mean, sure, I have muscles.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0103
rows.name: Anyone who's not blind can see that!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0104
rows.name: Well, yeah, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0105
rows.name: Yeah, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0106
rows.name: That is true, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0107
rows.name: Guess so...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0108
rows.name:
Tell you what, if you're so interested
in my strength, why don't I give you
a little demonstration?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0109
rows.name: Let's see...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0110
rows.name: What if I lifted that Divine Beast battleship?!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0111
rows.name: Wha-?!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0112
rows.name: Huh?!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0113
rows.name: How-?!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0114
rows.name: Whuh?!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0115
rows.name: I...don't think that's possible.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0116
rows.name: Gahahaha!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0117
rows.name: Yeah, you're right.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0118
rows.name:
But I could probably manage
Tortoga over there!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0119
rows.name: Ootsuchi, how about no.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0120
rows.name:
If you break Superbian hardware,
we'll all be paying for it.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0121
rows.name:
Hmph... Why does that sound
like a familiar story?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0122
rows.name: Then how about something like this?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0123
rows.name: Driver-throwing!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0124
rows.name:
I bet I can throw mine farther
than anyone else!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0125
rows.name: Good idea, that.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0126
rows.name:
I'm sure the Superbian military won't
mind that, at least.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0127
rows.name: Gahaha!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0128
rows.name:
It's on, then!
Let's do it!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0129
rows.name:
No, ah...
Hold on a second...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0130
rows.name:
Hold up!
Hold the hell up!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0131
rows.name:
Wait, please, let's not
do anything rash-

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0132
rows.name:
Hang on!
You can't-

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0133
rows.name: Ah, shaddup and watch!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0134
rows.name:
Putting your life in your Blade's hands
is what Drivers do!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0135
rows.name: Hngggh! Hyaaaaahhhh!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0136
rows.name: Aaaaaaah-!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0137
rows.name: Nooooo-!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0138
rows.name: Urghhh-!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0139
rows.name: I hate youuuuuuuuuu!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0140
rows.name:
Phew...
I thought I'd die.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0141
rows.name:
I think it's probably best not to mention
Ootsuchi's strength in future...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0142
rows.name:
Phew...
I'm so glad I'm alive...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0143
rows.name:
Let's maybe not talk to Ootsuchi about
physical strength, like, ever again...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0144
rows.name:
Ah...
A narrow escape...as it were.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0145
rows.name:
I think I will refrain from mentioning
physical strength to Ootsuchi again...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0146
rows.name:
Fwoosh...
I nearly wet myself...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0147
rows.name:
Let's maybe not talk to Ootsuchi
about physical strength...ever again.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0201
rows.name:
Oh, absolutely.
Ootsuchi is pretty damn skillful.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0202
rows.name: Heh! Sure am! Don't look it, do I?

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0203
rows.name:
Well, when it comes to tiny screws
for tiny Nopon hands, I admit I get
furious sometimes.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0204
rows.name: But anything else, and I'm your man.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0205
rows.name:
And when it comes to the fiddly parts,
that's where I step in.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0206
rows.name: I see!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0207
rows.name:
Satahiko takes care of the small things,
and Ootsuchi focuses on the big...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0208
rows.name: A perfect match-up!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0209
rows.name: Gotcha.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0210
rows.name:
Satahiko takes care of the little things,
and Ootsuchi the big ones...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0211
rows.name: Good combo, that!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0212
rows.name: I see.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0213
rows.name:
Satahiko takes care of the fine points,
while Ootsuchi focuses on the large...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0214
rows.name: A good pairing.

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0215
rows.name: Huh!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0216
rows.name:
So Satahiko does the little bits,
and Ootsuchi does the bigger ones...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0217
rows.name: Nice combo!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0218
rows.name: It is, isn't it...

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0219
rows.name: Gahaha!

rows.label: kizunatalk053_msg0220
rows.name: Yeah! Together we're unstoppable!
